channel.title: Making my Client runner compatible with (x64)

item.title: Making my Client runner compatible with (x64)
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

@Echo Off @CD ./Java Files/ @Title Run "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m EGUI
Here you go.

Read full topic
item.source: Making my Client runner compatible with (x64)

item.title: Making my Client runner compatible with (x64)
item.dc:creator: @suppyscape suppyscape
item.description:
@suppyscape wrote:

How can I make my run.bat file for my client compatible for users running on (x64) computer?

This is my run.bat file currently.

@echo off
cd Java Files
@title Run
START JAVAW -Xmx500m EGUI

Read full topic
item.source: Making my Client runner compatible with (x64)
